===============

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Notice Title:** SPARES FOR REPAIRS TO 50 GAL LOX TRAILERS

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01029520

**Publication Date:** March 9, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** April 18, 2023 (14:00:00)

**Request for Proposal**

The Department of National Defence seeks vendors for the procurement of spare parts for repairs to 50-gallon liquid oxygen (LOX) trailers. The successful bidder(s) will be required to deliver the spare parts to Canadian Forces Supply Depot (CFSD) Montreal and CFSD Edmonton by August 1, 2023.

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work includes the procurement and delivery of the following spare parts:

* GSIN: 4820, NSN: 01-099-6642, VALVE, RELIEF, PRESSURE AND TEMPERATURE (15 units)
* GSIN: 4820, NSN: 00-796-9680, VALVE, LIQUID OXYGEN (100 units)

**Bidder Requirements**

Bidders must ensure that the spare parts delivered meet the required standards and specifications. If a vendor proposes an equivalent or substitute product, they must provide detailed information, including the brand name, model, and/or part number, and the NCAGE (North American Industry Classification System) code.

**Electronic Bid Submission**

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly recommended to submit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.

**Language of the Contract**

The contract may be presented in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is subject to the provisions of the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

**Contracting Entity and Contact Information**

* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
* Contact Person: Debbie Bergeron
* Contact Email: debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca
* Contact Address: 455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7, Canada.
